ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: i once did this drop, and get with other char method, and when i droped my stuff it was there on the floor. I dropped it somewhere noone would look. then i
ygData.messageBody:
i once did this drop, and get with other char method, and when i droped my
stuff it was there on the floor. I dropped it somewhere noone would look.
then i logged on with new char, and the stuff was gone? anyone esle have
that problem?

----- Original Message -----
From: DeGirolami, Franck <degirolami@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 4:03 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: New Survey


> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> well here is the painful story actually...
> the first time, I used another enchanter that I met who needed the spell
> too. I went and bought two Enchant silver spells. well, due to a bug, one
> disappeared from my inventory. so I basically lost 4 plats+ and gave the
> remaining scroll to the person who helped me.
> the second time I got the money, there was nobody online that I knew
enough
> to trust... I just went into a certain location, dropped the money on the
> ground, logged on with my other character, took the money, bought the
spell,
> dropped the spell, relogged, and voila!
> my other character is a level 1 dark elf enchanter. I dont recommend this
> technique to anybody non-familiar to Nektulos forest. it's pretty hard for
a
> level 1 to make through there if you dont know where you're going. I had a
> level 16 necro before, so I know Nektulos and Neriak really well.
> Skara
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 12:56 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: New Survey
>
>
> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> how do you transfer items between charecters then? dont you have to log
off
> with one to log in with the other?
> or are you using a friend for this?
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: DeGirolami, Franck <degirolami@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 3:54 PM
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: New Survey
>
>
> > From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
> >
> > I created a dark-elf character to get it for my main character, hehe...
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: WeinisFROG@... [mailto:WeinisFROG@...]
> > Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 12:45 PM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: New Survey
> >
> >
> > From: WeinisFROG@...
> >
> > In a message dated 4/26/99 3:17:15 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> > eqenchanters-owner@onelist.com writes:
> >
> > o I payed another player who is a dark elf to buy it for me.
> > o I am below level 8.
> >
> >
> > This may sound strange but at the time that i got someone to buy me the
> > spell
> > i was lvl 8 but then all of the lag got me and i am now lvl 7
> >
